## Goodhart's law

"When a measure becomes a target, it ceases to be a good measure".

-   how fixation on measuring/tracking takes precedence over what you measure/track

## Less is more

-   how keeping things simple helps you long term

## Reducing cognitive pressure

-   make the process simple, brain-dead, easy to do

## Enjoying life

-   how being present in the moment is much more important than tracking
